body:
Lets implement this. 

I think that tensors should definitely be converted to Variable with `requires_grad=False`, *not* `volatile=True`, because (a) the fact that you provide one input as a tensor in no way implies that you don't need gradients of other inputs; (b) `volatile` is just an optimization; better to leave it functional by default, and the user can always set `volatile=True` (or disable gradients another way like `model.eval()`) if they need that optimization.
